name: Song Pong
description:
Download and play Song Pong, the arcade music game hybrid everyone is talking about! This game is great for both fans of rhythm games and of the original arcade classic.

- Slide your finger to move the paddle
- Hit all the notes with the correct color
- Your paddle will occasionally split to up the difficulty
- Perform well to earn a combo bonus

Download Song Pong and see how many songs you can clear!
